video_prompt: A celestial deer-like creature, made of shifting starry patterns and nebulous blue light, gently moves its head, its piercing blue eyes scanning. Its golden, glowing antlers subtly pulsate, releasing trails of sparkling motes. Small, luminous cosmic dust drifts slowly around its feet.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A majestic, full-body vertical image of a deer-like creature made of a starry night sky, with a deep blue body adorned with sparkling points of light, forming cosmic patterns. Its head is deep blue with piercing light blue eyes. Intricate, glowing golden-yellow antlers dramatically branch upwards, emitting smaller golden specks. It stands on unseen, faintly luminous dark ground against an absolute black background. The creature is internally lit by its glowing form and antlers. Ethereal, fantastical, cosmic, mythological art style.
refined_video_prompt: Starry patterns and nebulous blue light constantly shift and flow, forming and reforming a deer-like presence. Its head gently moves, piercing blue eyes scanning. Golden, glowing antlers subtly pulsate, releasing trails of sparkling motes. Luminous cosmic dust drifts slowly around its feet.
